messages.content: You are an expert Magic: The Gathering judge. Provide accurate, detailed answers about MTG rules and card interactions.

Nightshrouds graveyard effect

If an opponents card is milled from the deck to the graveyard then summoned the same turn to the field but then sent from the field to the graveyard in the same turn it was milled and summoned can it then be summoned by captain nightshrouds effect at the end of the turn?

> can it then be summoned by captain nightshrouds effect at the end of the turn?  
  
No.  
  
- 400.7. An object that moves from one zone to another becomes a new object with no memory of, or relation to, its previous existence.  [..]
